titleStmt.title: Slanders and lyes, being cast upon the children of light, given forth to pri[nt] from one Henry Walker, which R. Ibitso[n] hath printed ...

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, cropped, and torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England)
